```{r setup, include=FALSE}
                "possible gene 5.5-5.7",
                "gene 1.5",
```

```{r}
labels <- read_csv("output/id_map.csv") %>% filter(!is.na(gene_number))
load_sim <- function(paths) {
  data_list <- lapply(paths, function(path) {
    read_tsv(path) %>%
      mutate(file = path) %>%
      group_by(time) %>%
      nest() %>%
      mutate(data = purrr::map(data, ~full_join(labels, ., by = c("pinetree" = "species")))) %>%
      unnest() %>%
      mutate(time = round(time)) %>%
      mutate(protein = if_else(is.na(protein), 0, protein),
             transcript = if_else(is.na(transcript), 0, transcript)) %>%
      filter(
        !(pinetree %in% IGNORE_GENES),
        (!is.na(gene_number) | 
         str_detect(pinetree, "nonpref_charged|nonpref_uncharged|pref_charged|pref_uncharged"))
      )
  })
  bind_rows(data_list)
}

# Define the output directory
output_dir <- "data/simulation/phage/codon_parallel_output"

# Generate file paths
seeds <- 1:3
fop_proportions <- 1:9

file_paths <- expand.grid(seed = seeds, fop = fop_proportions) %>%
  mutate(file_name = sprintf("trna_phage_pref0.7_%d_fop%d.tsv", seed, fop)) %>%
  mutate(full_path = file.path(output_dir, file_name))

# Load all simulations
all_data <- load_sim(file_paths$full_path)

# Add proportion and seed columns
all_data <- all_data %>%
  mutate(
    seed = as.numeric(str_extract(file, "(?<=_)0-9")),
    proportion = as.numeric(str_extract(file, "(?<=pref)[0-9]\\.[0-9]")),
    fop = as.numeric(str_extract(file, "(?<=fop)[0-9]+"))
  )

# Filter the data 
nonpref_charged_data <- all_data %>%
  filter(str_detect(pinetree, "nonpref_charged"))
nonpref_uncharged_data <- all_data %>%
  filter(str_detect(pinetree, "nonpref_uncharged"))

pref_charged_data <- all_data %>%
  filter(str_detect(pinetree, "pref_charged"))
pref_uncharged_data <- all_data %>%
  filter(str_detect(pinetree, "pref_uncharged"))

# Calculate average fraction of charged tRNAs for each proportion at 825 seconds
avg_nonpref_charged_825 <- nonpref_charged_data %>%
  filter(time == 825) %>%
  group_by(fop) %>%
  summarize(avg_charged = mean(protein), .groups = "drop")

avg_nonpref_total_825 <- nonpref_uncharged_data %>%
  filter(time == 825) %>%
  group_by(fop) %>%
  summarize(avg_total = mean(protein), .groups = "drop")

avg_pref_charged_825 <- pref_charged_data %>%
  filter(time == 825) %>%
  group_by(fop) %>%
  summarize(avg_charged = mean(protein), .groups = "drop")

avg_pref_total_825 <- pref_uncharged_data %>%
  filter(time == 825) %>%
  group_by(fop) %>%
  summarize(avg_total = mean(protein), .groups = "drop")

# Combine the data for plotting
avg_nonpref_825 <- left_join(avg_nonpref_charged_825, avg_nonpref_total_825, by = "fop") %>%
  mutate(type = "Nonpref Charged")

avg_pref_825 <- left_join(avg_pref_charged_825, avg_pref_total_825, by = "fop") %>%
  mutate(type = "Pref Charged")

avg_tRNAfractionCharged_825 <- bind_rows(avg_nonpref_825, avg_pref_825)

# Create the plot
avg_plot_825 <- ggplot(avg_tRNAfractionCharged_825, aes(x = fop, y = avg_charged / (avg_charged + avg_total), color = type)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Fraction of Optimal Codons", y = "Fraction of Charged tRNAs at 825s") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1, 9, by = 1), labels = seq(0.1, 0.9, by = 0.1)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = cbPalette)

if (SAVE_FIGS) {
  save_plot("analysis/figures/avg_tRNAfractionCharged_by_proportion_825s.pdf", avg_plot_825, base_width = 12, base_height = 16)
}
```
